sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Yiren Digital Selects Wei, Wei & Co., LLP as its Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm
feed.summary: BEIJING, April 29, 2022 /PRNewswire/ -- Yiren Digital Ltd.  ( NYSE: YRD )   ( "Yiren Digital" or the "Company" ) , a leading digital personal financial management platform in China, today announced that, effective as of April 28, 2022, the Company engaged Wei, Wei & Co., LLP  ( "WWC" ) , as the Company's independent registered public accounting firm, to replace KPMG Huazhen LLP  ( "KPMG" ) . The change of the Company's independent registered public accounting firm was approved by the audit committee and the board of the Company.
